title: Thank you, Elvis Vol. 1
description: This edition was previously published under the ASIN B07CZZSDRB That night he found Beau walking down the bleak streets he knew exactly what he was doing. For hours Richard had been watching him in the interrogation room, his eyes coveting the way that cigarette easily slid between his lips. He knew what Beau’s night time occupation was—he’s always known.  Richard wasn’t a cop for nothing.
author: J.K.  Jones
